data.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger
data.text:
AKA Arnold Alois Schwarzenegger

Born: 30-Jul-1947

Birthplace: Thal, Austria

Gender: Male

Religion: Roman Catholic

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor, Politician

Party Affiliation: Republican

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Governor of California, 2003-11

Military service: Austrian Army

Austrian-born action movie star elected Governor of California, succeeding Gray Davis in 2003 and succeeded by Jerry Brown in 2011. Married to journalist Maria Shriver, they later separated after he revealed fathering a child with one of their staff and concealing the paternity for over a decade.

Father: Gustav Schwarzenegger (b. 1907, d. 1974, coronary)

Mother: Aurelia Jadrny (b. 30-Jul-1922, d. 2-Aug-1998, stroke)

Brother: Meinhard (d. 1971, DWI)

Girlfriend: Barbara Outland Baker (together 1969-74)

Girlfriend: Sue Moray (hairdresser, together 1976-78)

Girlfriend: Brigitte Nielsen (actress, together 1984-85)

Wife: Maria Shriver (TV journalist, m. 26-Apr-1986, sep. 2011)

Daughter: Katherine Eunice (b. 13-Dec-1989)

Daughter: Christina Maria Aurelia (b. 23-Jul-1991)

Son: Patrick Arnold (model, b. 18-Sep-1993)

Son: Christopher Sargent Shriver (b. 27-Sep-1997)

Mistress: Tammy Baker Tousignant (flight attendant, denied by both parties)

Mistress: Rachel Ticotin (1989, rumor reported by Premiere)

Mistress: Gigi Goyette (1989-96, according to her)

Mistress: Mildred Patricia Baena ("Patty", housekeeper, one son)

Son: Joseph Baena (b. 2-Oct-1997)

University: Santa Monica College, Santa Monica, CA

University: BS Business and International Economics, University of Wisconsin at Superior (1979)

Governor of California (2003-11)

President's Council on Physical Fitness and Sports Chairman (1990-92)

California Recall Election

Planet Hollywood roughly 5% ownership

George Bush Presidential Library Trustee

Afghanistan World Foundation Celebrity Committee

Republican Main Street Partnership

Special Olympics

US English Advisory Board

Hollywood Walk of Fame 6764 Hollywood Blvd

Open Heart Surgery

Naturalized US Citizen 16-Sep-1983

AWOL from Austrian Army

WWE Hall of Fame 2015

Kennedy Family

Wedding: Arnold Schwarzenegger and Maria Shriver (1986)

Roast: Tim Russert (1993)

Mar-a-Lago Club 1994

Funeral: Ted Kennedy (2009)

Libel lawsuit filed by TV host Anna Richardson (May-2004), settled (Aug-2006)

Funeral: Muhammad Ali (2016)

Austrian Ancestry

Risk Factors: Smoking, Performance-Enhancing Drugs, Marijuana
